translated: It is the mental consciousness, the contact that is the coming together of the eye, the contact that is the coming together of the ear, the contact that is the coming together of the nose, the contact that is the coming together of the tongue,ðŸ”½the contact that is the coming together of the body, and the contact that is the coming together of the mind, the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact that is the coming together of the eye, the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact that is the coming together of the ear,

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / lus kyi @309b 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / lus kyi @309b 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang /
translated: the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact that is the coming together of the nose, the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact that is the coming together of the tongue, the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact that is the coming together of the body, and the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact that is the coming together of the mind.

original: sa'i khams gang yin pa dang / chu'i khams gang yin pa dang / me'i khams gang yin pa dang / rlung gi khams gang yin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa dang / ma rig pa gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: sa'i khams gang yin pa dang / chu'i khams gang yin pa dang / me'i khams gang yin pa dang / rlung gi khams gang yin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa dang / ma rig pa gang yin pa dang /
translated: What is the earth element? What is the water element? What is the fire element? What is the wind element? What is the space element? What is the consciousness element? What is ignorance?

original: 'du byed gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / ming dang gzugs gang yin pa dang / skye mched drug gang yin pa dang / reg pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang / sred pa gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: 'du byed gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / ming dang gzugs gang yin pa dang / skye mched drug gang yin pa dang / reg pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang / sred pa gang yin pa dang /
translated: What is formation? What is consciousness? What is name and form? What are the six sense sources? What is contact? What is feeling? What is craving?

original: len pa gang yin pa dang / srid pa gang yin pa dang / skye ba gang yin pa dang / rga shi gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /

translated: What is grasping? What is becoming? What is birth? What is old age and death? What is the perfection of generosity? What is the perfection of discipline?
